about_the_game:
Make your own school and make your own rules! This is the newest pack from our popular and growing Modern+ collection, and contains tiles for designing the interiors of a modern school like: Tables, bookshelves, basketball court and items, soccer items, musical instruments, lockers, computers, bathrooms, food machines, plants, boards, pool, and much more!

Contains tiles with 4 angles, to make more realistic rooms. Now you can create your own school with your own rules!

Features:

* Contains all the items you will need for a comprehensive modern school setting!
* Tiles formatted for use with RPG Maker MV
* For use with RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Modern + Study Time MZ" and "RPG Maker MV -Modern + Study Time MV" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
